snippet: A dramatic video previewing a rover’s journey to Mars has succeeded in an area where NASA has a mixed record: using social media.
abstract: NASA's dramatic video previewing a rover’s journey to Mars has succeeded in an area where the agency has had a mixed record: using social media to whip up interest in space exploration; video has been viewed on YouTube more than half a million times; rover Curiosity will attempt to land on Mars in August.
lead_paragraph: A dramatic video previewing a rover’s journey to Mars has succeeded in an area where NASA has a mixed record: using social media.

headline.seo: “Seven Minutes of Terror” Video Grabs Online Audience for NASA
headline.main: Simulated Space ‘Terror’ Offers NASA an Online Following
headline.print_headline: Simulated Space ‘Terror’ Offers NASA an Online Following
